scripts.start:test:all: npm run start:test:javascript && npm run start:test:typescript && npm run start:test:javascript:skip-install && npm run start:test:typescript:skip-install
scripts.start:test:javascript: rimraf test-out-js && npm run start -- test-out-js --verbose
scripts.start:test:typescript: rimraf test-out-ts && npm run start -- test-out-ts --verbose --typescript
scripts.start:test:javascript:skip-install: rimraf test-out-js-noinst && npm run start -- test-out-js-noinst --verbose --skip-install
scripts.start:test:typescript:skip-install: rimraf test-out-ts-noinst && npm run start -- test-out-ts-noinst --verbose --typescript --skip-install
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run package
